Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエンの料理は、 ピリッと辛いので有名だぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen's cuisine is famous for being spicy.

Entry.JapaneseText: そういえば、あんた、 あんまり辛い料理を作らないわね？
Entry.EnglishText: That reminds me, you don't make spicy food often, do you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、どっちかっていうと、 辛いモノは苦手なんだよなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, well actually, I can't handle anything spicy.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、あんたの好物って、 カレーじゃなかったっけ？
Entry.EnglishText: But didn't you say that your favorite food was curry?

Entry.JapaneseText: おうよ、だからおれは、 ハチミツたーっぷりの甘口専門だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yep, but I specialize in making things sweet, so I load it up with honey.

Entry.JapaneseText: わかってないのね…… カレーは中辛に限るわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't get you... Curry has to be at least medium-spicy...
